qas.question: How much land is owned by the MoD?
How much is the land owned by the MoD worth?
The MoD owns or has rights of access to what percentage of the UK's total land?
How much is the annual cost to support the defence estate?
Who is one of the largest landowners in the UK?
Who is one of the UK's largest owners of debt?
How much debt does the Ministry of Defence own?
What is the annual cost to support rights of access for UK citizens?
How much of the population of the UK has rights of access?
What is the total cost of supporting UK citizens rights to own land?

context: <a4_0><b5_0>The Ministry of Defence<b5_0/><a4_0/> is one of the United Kingdom's largest landowners, owning <a0_0>227,300 hectares<a0_0/> of land and foreshore (either freehold or leasehold) at April 2014, which was valued at "about <a1_0><b6_0>£20 billion<b6_0/><a1_0/>". The MoD also has "rights of access" to a further 222,000 hectares. In total, this is about <a2_0><b8_0>1.8%<b8_0/><a2_0/> of the UK land mass. The total annual cost to support the defence estate is <b7_0>"<a3_0>in excess of <b9_0>£3.3 billion<a3_0/>"<b9_0/><b7_0/>.
